improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The value of x becomes 0 after the for loop.  The program should handle cases where x might be zero before performing the division.
Unreachable code. The condition `x > 0` will always be true during the iterations of the for loop, so the `y = 0` assignment within the if block is redundant
The loop always sets y to 0. The final value of y is overwritten by the subsequent division.  Consider removing unnecessary operations.
